english_meaning: used before a word beginning with a consonant sound to refer to a single item or one of many

examples.turkish: Röportaj için idare eder bir takım elbise giydi.

examples.english: The hotel provided decent accommodations.

examples.english: She made a decent effort on the assignment.

english_meaning: to make a choice from a number of alternatives

examples.english: I need to decide what to wear for the party.

examples.english: She decided to study abroad.
They couldn't decide between the two options.

english_meaning: a conclusion or resolution reached after consideration

examples.english: The decision was made after a long discussion.
examples.turkish: Uzun bir tartışmadan sonra karar verildi.

examples.english: She made a quick decision.
The board's decision surprised everyone.

english_meaning: to announce something clearly, firmly, or officially

examples.english: The president declared a state of emergency.

english_meaning: to refuse politely; a gradual and continuous loss of strength or quality

examples.english: She declined the invitation to the party.
There has been a decline in sales this year.

examples.english: His health began to decline after the accident.

english_meaning: to make something look more attractive by adding extra items or images to it

examples.english: They decorated the room for the party.
She decorated her house with colorful lights.

english_meaning: the process or art of decorating; an ornament or adornment

english_meaning: to make or become smaller or fewer in size, amount, intensity, or degree; a reduction

examples.english: The company plans to decrease its prices.
There has been a decrease in pollution levels.
We need to decrease our energy consumption.

english_meaning: extending far down from the top or surface; to a great extent

examples.english: The water in the lake is very deep.

He thought deeply about the problem.

english_meaning: to a great depth; extremely

examples.english: She was deeply moved by the speech.
He is deeply committed to his work.

english_meaning: to win a victory over someone or something; a loss in a contest

examples.english: The team was determined not to suffer defeat.

english_meaning: the action of defending from or resisting attack; protection

english_meaning: to protect from harm or danger; to support or uphold

examples.english: They defended their decision in the meeting.

english_meaning: to explain the meaning of a word or phrase; to determine the boundaries or limits of

examples.english: Please define the term in your own words.

examples.english: They defined the project scope at the start.

english_meaning: clearly defined or determined; not vague or general

english_meaning: without doubt; certainly

examples.english: I will definitely come to the party.

english_meaning: to please someone greatly; great pleasure

english_meaning: feeling or showing great pleasure

examples.english: She was delighted to receive the news.

english_meaning: to bring and hand over (a letter, parcel, or ordered goods) to the proper recipient or address

examples.english: The delivery was delayed due to traffic.

examples.english: Her delivery of the speech was flawless.

english_meaning: an insistent and peremptory request, made as if by right; to ask authoritatively for something

english_meaning: to show or prove something clearly by giving evidence or examples

english_meaning: a person qualified to treat the diseases and conditions that affect the teeth and gums

english_meaning: to state that one refuses to admit the truth or existence of something

english_meaning: a division of a large organization such as a government, university, business, or shop

english_meaning: to be determined or controlled by; to rely on

english_meaning: in a state of general unhappiness or despondency

english_meaning: to give an account in words of someone or something, including all the relevant characteristics, qualities, or events

examples.english: The woman in the red dress smiled at everyone.
She is a strong and independent woman.
examples.turkish: O, güçlü ve bağımsız bir kadındır.

examples.english: The woman helped the elderly man cross the street.
examples.turkish: Kadın, yaşlı adama sokaktan geçmesine yardım etti.

english_meaning: to feel curiosity or doubt; a feeling of amazement and admiration
turkish_meaning: merak etmek, hayret; mucize, harika şey

examples.english: I wonder if it will rain tomorrow.
examples.turkish: Yarın yağmur yağar mı merak ediyorum.

examples.english: The wonder of the ancient ruins amazed everyone.
examples.turkish: Antik harabelerin hayret verici güzelliği herkesi büyüledi.

examples.english: She wondered about the meaning of life.

english_meaning: inspiring delight, pleasure, or admiration; extremely good

examples.english: We had a wonderful time at the party.
The view from the mountain was absolutely wonderful.
She did a wonderful job on her presentation.

english_meaning: the hard fibrous material that forms the main substance of the trunk or branches of a tree

examples.english: They built the cabin out of wood.
Wood is used in furniture making.
The artist carved a statue from wood.

english_meaning: made of wood

examples.english: They sat at a wooden table.
The wooden chair was very sturdy.
She decorated the room with wooden ornaments.

english_meaning: the fine, soft hair grown on the coats of sheep and certain other animals, used to make cloth

examples.english: She knitted a scarf out of wool.
Wool is a warm material for winter clothes.
examples.turkish: Yün, kışlık giysiler için sıcak bir malzemedir.

examples.english: The sweater is made of 100% wool.

english_meaning: a single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing

examples.english: Please write a word on the board.
Every word in the sentence is important.
He learned a new word every day.
examples.turkish: Her gün yeni bir kelime öğrendi.

english_meaning: to perform tasks or labor; physical or mental effort directed to produce or accomplish something

examples.english: They work hard every day.
She found a new job and started work last week.
examples.turkish: Yeni bir iş buldu ve geçen hafta işe başladı.

examples.english: His work on the project was outstanding.

english_meaning: a person who is employed to perform work

examples.english: The factory employs many workers.
A hardworking worker always gets recognized.
examples.turkish: Çalışkan bir işçi her zaman takdir edilir.

examples.english: The workers went on strike for better conditions.
examples.turkish: Daha iyi koşullar için işçiler grev yaptı.

english_meaning: engaged in or ready for work; in operation

examples.english: The machine is working perfectly.
She has a busy working schedule.
We are looking for working professionals.

english_meaning: the earth, together with all of its countries and peoples

examples.english: The world is becoming more connected every day.
examples.turkish: Dünya her gün daha da birbirine bağlı hale geliyor.

examples.english: She dreams of traveling around the world.
Many problems affect the world as a whole.

english_meaning: extending or reaching throughout the world

examples.english: The company has a worldwide presence.
examples.turkish: Şirketin dünya çapında bir varlığı var.

examples.english: He is known worldwide for his humanitarian work.
Their products are sold worldwide.

english_meaning: feeling anxious or troubled about actual or potential problems

examples.english: She was very worried about the exam.
He looked worried when he heard the news.
They are worried about the upcoming storm.

english_meaning: to feel anxious or troubled; a state of anxiety

examples.english: Don't worry, everything will be fine.
She has a lot of worry about her future.
Worrying too much can be harmful to your health.
examples.turkish: Çok fazla endişelenmek sağlığınıza zararlı olabilir.

english_meaning: of poorer quality or lower standard; more serious or severe; a disadvantage

examples.english: The weather today is worse than yesterday.
His condition became worse over time.
This is the worse part of the journey.

english_meaning: of the lowest quality or most unfavorable condition

examples.english: This is the worst movie I have ever seen.
examples.turkish: Bu, şimdiye kadar izlediğim en kötü film.

examples.english: She felt the worst pain during the operation.
examples.turkish: Ameliyat sırasında en kötü acıyı hissetti.

examples.english: He made the worst decision possible.
examples.turkish: O, mümkün olan en kötü kararı verdi.

english_meaning: equivalent in value to; the importance or value of something

examples.english: This painting is worth a lot of money.
Is it worth buying that expensive gadget?
examples.turkish: O pahalı cihazı almaya değer mi?

examples.english: Her advice is always worth considering.
examples.turkish: Onun tavsiyelerini her zaman değerlendirmeye değer.

english_meaning: used to indicate the future in the past, or a habitual action in the past

examples.english: When I was a child, I would play outside every day.
I would love to visit Japan someday.
examples.turkish: Bir gün Japonya'yı ziyaret etmeyi çok isterim.

examples.english: He said he would call me later.

english_meaning: an injury to living tissue; past tense of wind (to twist)

examples.english: He suffered a deep wound on his arm.
The soldier's wound required immediate attention.
She wound the cable neatly around the reel.
examples.turkish: Kabloları makaraya düzenli bir şekilde sardı.

english_meaning: used to express astonishment or admiration

examples.english: Wow, that was an amazing performance!
Wow, you did a fantastic job.
Wow, I can't believe how beautiful this place is.
examples.turkish: Vay, bu yerin ne kadar güzel olduğuna inanamıyorum.

english_meaning: to cover or enclose something in paper or soft material

examples.english: Please wrap the gift in colorful paper.
She wrapped the scarf around her neck.
They wrapped the leftovers to save for later.
examples.turkish: Artıkları daha sonra yemek için sardılar.

english_meaning: to form letters, words, or symbols on a surface with an instrument

examples.english: Please write your name on the paper.
She likes to write stories in her journal.
He writes emails to his colleagues every day.

english_meaning: a person who writes, especially as an occupation

examples.english: The writer published a new novel last month.
examples.turkish: Yazar geçen ay yeni bir roman yayımladı.

examples.english: She is a famous writer known worldwide.
examples.turkish: Dünya çapında tanınan ünlü bir yazardır.

examples.english: The writer spends hours in his study.

english_meaning: the activity or skill of marking coherent words on paper and composing text

examples.english: Her writing is clear and expressive.
He enjoys creative writing in his free time.
examples.turkish: Boş zamanlarında yaratıcı yazı yazmaktan hoşlanır.

examples.english: Good writing is essential in school.

english_meaning: expressed in writing or printed form

examples.english: She prefers written instructions to verbal ones.
examples.turkish: Sözlü talimatlara kıyasla yazılı talimatları tercih eder.

examples.english: The written report was very detailed.
His written communication is excellent.

english_meaning: not correct or true; mistaken; injustice or wrongdoing

examples.english: You gave the wrong answer.
It is wrong to cheat on a test.
He felt it was wrong to treat people unfairly.
examples.turkish: İnsanlara haksızlık etmenin yanlış olduğunu düşündü.

english_meaning: an area of land next to a building, often used for gardening or recreation

examples.english: The children played in the yard.
They have a beautiful garden in their yard.
He spent the afternoon working in the yard.

english_meaning: an informal way to say yes

examples.english: Yeah, I'll come with you.
Yeah, that sounds like a good idea.
Yeah, I agree with you completely.

english_meaning: a period of 365 days (or 366 in a leap year)

examples.english: There are 12 months in a year.
She traveled around the world last year.
Every year, they celebrate their anniversary.

english_meaning: of the color between green and orange in the spectrum; a color

examples.english: The sunflowers are bright yellow.
She painted her room yellow.
Yellow is my favorite color.

english_meaning: used to give an affirmative response

examples.english: Yes, I would like some tea.
Yes, that's correct.
Yes, I understand your point.

english_meaning: on the day before today; the day before the present day

examples.english: I went to the cinema yesterday.
Yesterday was a very busy day.
She called me yesterday to catch up.
examples.turkish: Dün beni aradı, sohbet etmek için.

english_meaning: up to now or the expected time; used to introduce a contrast

examples.english: I haven't finished my homework yet.
She is young yet very responsible.
We have not received a reply yet.

english_meaning: used to refer to the person or people that the speaker is addressing

examples.english: You are my best friend.
Can you help me with this problem?
examples.turkish: Bu konuda bana yardım edebilir misin?

examples.english: I appreciate everything you do.
examples.turkish: Yaptığın her şey için teşekkür ederim.

english_meaning: having lived or existed for only a short time; a young person

examples.english: The young boy is very curious.
She is one of the young leaders in the community.
They organized a camp for young people.

english_meaning: belonging to or associated with the person or people that the speaker is addressing

examples.english: Is this your bag?
Please bring your documents to the meeting.
Your opinion matters to us.

english_meaning: belonging to or associated with you

examples.english: This book is yours.
All the credit for the project is yours.
Is this pen yours?

english_meaning: used to emphasize the person being addressed

examples.english: You should believe in yourself.
Did you make this cake yourself?
Take care of yourself.

english_meaning: the period between childhood and adult age; young people collectively

examples.english: The youth of today are the leaders of tomorrow.
She spent her youth traveling the world.
Youth is a time of great opportunity.

english_meaning: the numerical symbol 0; none

examples.english: There were zero errors in his report.
The temperature dropped to zero degrees last night.
He has zero interest in playing sports.

english_meaning: an area or stretch of land having a particular characteristic, purpose, or use

examples.english: This area is a no-parking zone.
The city is divided into several zones.
He entered the danger zone without a helmet.
